meanings.definition: Make (something) greater by adding to it; increase.
meanings.sent1: She decided to augment her savings by depositing a little extra each month.
meanings.sent2: The chef used spices to augment the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to augment his rabbit trick by adding a top hat.
meanings.sent4: His kindness augmented the warmth of the room like a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the window seemed to augment the beauty of the flowers.

meanings.definition: A thing that is added or added to.
meanings.sent1: The new painting was a beautiful augment to the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: The latest software update included an augment to the user interface.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected gift was a delightful augment to her birthday celebration.
meanings.sent4: The extra toppings on the pizza were a flavorful augment to the meal.
meanings.sent5: The colorful scarf was a perfect augment to her outfit.
